EmailTemplate.description: Notification to Approver that a form has been submitted for them to approve/reject.
EmailTemplate.name: Form Submission Notification Template
EmailTemplate.subject: A Form Has Been Submitted For Your Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ApprovalRequest.Process_Assignee},
The Form {!Forms__c.Form_Type__c} {!Forms__c.Name__c} has been submitted for your approval.
{!Forms__c.Link}
Thank you
